name: Price as per Unit for WooCommerce
author: Sunarc

sections.description:
Price as per unit plugin takes the price of the product and divides this price by its weight, which help to sell products to the customer to know how much a weight unit costs.
For example when selling any items. Price of goods/items calculated per weight and then shown according to customer like.

Features of Plugin

Helps to determine how much unit cost.
Takes the product price from product.
Calculate the Unit cost divide by Product weight.

A brief Markdown Example

This plugin helps to sell products, which customer want to sell as unit price base. For example Cloths , any goods and material which is can measure by unit and contains weight for the products.

Use Cases of Price as per Unit for WooCommerce

  1. To customer know how much a weight unit costs.
  2. It takes the price product and divides this price by its weight and displayed to customer
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the /Plugins/ screen in WordPress
  3. Woocommerce->settings->Price per unit for wc product
    Note: This plug-in works only if a weight set on the product. This is an independent setting used for shipping purposes.
sections.faq:
What are the basic advantages of this plugin?

Price as per unit plugin takes the price of the product and divides this price by its weight, which help to sell products to the customer to know how much a weight unit costs.

Is this a free plugin of Price as per Unit ?

Yes, this is a free plugin of Price as per Unit. This provides only Price as per unit which takes the price of the product and divides this price by its weight, which help to sell products to the customer to know how much a weight unit costs.

What wordpress version Price as per Unit plugin supports?

Currently, this product supports the wordpress version till the 5.7 Version.
